last_phrase: In conclusion, taking care of our bodies is essential to maintaining our health and prolonging our vitality. The different organs in our bodies do not age at the same rate, and their health is impacted by heredity, hygiene, past infections, and toxicity. Assimilation and disassimilation are the secrets of life, and the insufficient removal of waste products is the primary cause of aging. To prevent premature aging, it is crucial to focus on nourishing and exercising the entire body, including the internal organs, skin, blood quality, and nervous system. By doing so, we can enjoy a renewed sense of energy and vitality that can help us live a full and happy life.
